data.actual_result: It spams "This server has reached the maximum of invites" and "You are being rate limited"
data.expected_result: It shouldn't spam "This serve has reached the maximum of invites" and "You are being rate limited" after
data.short_description: When trying to make a Invite for a server that has reached the maximum of invites it spams "This server has reached the maximum of invites" (**6.6.6 only**)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server that has reached the maximum of invites (I used the "Project Blurple" Server) - Click "Create Instant Invite" - Observe
